quiz.question: What is the SI unit of force?
Which of the following is a vector quantity?
What does Newton's First Law of Motion state?
choices: Force is equal to mass times acceleration.
Every action has an equal and opposite reaction.
An object remains at rest or in motion unless acted upon by a force.
quiz.correctAnswer: An object remains at rest or in motion unless acted upon by a force.
